fees.description: You may be charged a 0.32% merchant service fee for paying by Visa or Mastercard (unless you pay via direct debit)
A fee of $12 may apply for payments made after the due date (GST exempt).

electricityContract.terms: For further details on the information presented in this Plan Information Document, or for full terms and conditions, please visit engie.com.au/residential/energy-efficiency/engie-vpp or call ENGIE on 1800 290 773. All time-dependent rates (eg. 4pm to 8pm) are billed in AEST. All time-dependent rates (eg. 4pm to 8pm) are billed in AEST.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates and charges at any time, including if any underlying information is incorrect, you get a new meter or your distributor changes your tariff. We'll give you advance notice of any change, which may be on your bill.

incentives.description: Receive $200 (GST exempt) sign-up credit as well as approx $20 monthly credit per battery for participating in our VPP, which is calculated by multiplying 0.657534c (GST exempt) by the number of days in a month applied on your next bill.

eligibility.description: Your inverter size must be a minimum of 5kW and a maximum of 10kW.
You must have a remotely read interval meter (smart meter).
You must have an available, continuous, and reliable internet connection to which your eligible battery is connected (excluding 3G & 4G internet connections).
You must have an eligible battery installed at your premises.

singleRate.description: Separately metered usage. The hours of application are determined by your Distributor.

solarFeedInTariff.description: 11c/kWh for the first 8kWh per day of solar export,
And 5.5c/kWh thereafter, based on a daily average over your billing period.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Ongoing energy plan until you or we end it. We may end this energy plan at any time by giving you 20 Business Days' notice.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees may apply. For information please contact us on 13 88 08.
